title: Total loss
alt: In 2033, a woman has an encounter with the first ever robotic sentient being, created in a lab with full consciousness. Non-Fiction Sci-Fi.

title: Never in doubt
alt: This series is a reflection from the book 'Never Let Me Go' by K. Ishiguro.

title: Ramifications
alt: A little blackbird singing a sweet song that hides behind our tangled personality. Ethereal beauty on the outside, dark and mysterious on the inside.

title: Odorious
alt: The chair was designed such that the feeling of the uncanny complements the discomfiture of the user due to the (strategic?) placement of the two women.
